snippet: With the retiring Lleyton Hewitt set for a bitter-sweet farewell from the Australian Open, the burden of home expectations will land heavily on the shoulders of talented but tempestuous duo Nick Kyrgios and Bernard Tomic....
lead_paragraph: With the retiring Lleyton Hewitt set for a bitter-sweet farewell from the Australian Open, the burden of home expectations will land heavily on the shoulders of talented but tempestuous duo Nick Kyrgios and Bernard Tomic.

headline.print_headline: With Hewitt Retiring, Australia Looks to New Generation
headline.main: With Hewitt Retiring, Australia Looks to New Generation
